alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Towns; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Towns, Union and northeastern Fannin Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Gumlog to near Nottely Dam to Hurst, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hiawassee, Blairsville, Young Harris, Hemp, Brasstown Bald, Gumlog, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Jones Creek, Owltown, Track Rock and Alexanders Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for north central Georgia.
